piercer.name: Piercer Revolver
piercer.description: Hold Alt Fire to charge a 3-hit beam.

marksman.name: Marksman Revolver
marksman.description: Press Alt Fire to throw a coin. Hit an airborne coine to deflect yopur shot into the nearest enemy's weakpoint. Coins can be chained.

sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter Revolver
sharpshooter.description: Hold Alt Fire to charge a piercing beam that ricochets off surfaces. Can destroy projectiles.

core_eject.name: Core Eject Shotgun
core_eject.description: Press Alt Fire to overheat and launch the shotgun's cores. Hold to charge distance. Explodes on impact.

pump_charge.name: Pump Charge Shotgun
pump_charge.description: Press Alt Fire to pump your shotgun, increasing the power and decreasing the accuracy of your next shot. Too many pumps will cause an explosion when fired.

sawed-on.name: Sawed-On Shotgun
sawed-on.description: Hold Alt Fire to rev chainsaw. Release to launch, piercing enemies and returning back. Can be punches to keep active.

attractor.name: Attractor Nailgun
attractor.description: Alt Fire to shoot a magnet that pulls all nearby nails towards it. Magnets stick to surfactes and enemies and can be broken with hitscan weapons.

overheat.name: Overheat Nailgun
overheat.description: Alt Fire while shooting to overheat for a quick burst of damage at the cost of a heatsink. Heatsinks recharge while not firing.

jumpstart.name: Jumpstart Nailgun
jumpstart.description: Press Alt Fire to attach a cable that slowly charges a powerful electric shock. Attached cables persist when switching weapons.

electric.name: Electric Railcannon
electric.description: A powerful instant piercing shot. Pierces throught all enemies. Pay attention to your positioning to maximize destruction. Don't use in water.

screwdriver.name: Screwdriver Railcannon
screwdriver.description: Fires a powerful drill that sticks to an enemy and deals damage over time. The drill causes enemies to bleed continuously with extraq healing range.

malicious.name: Malicious Railcannon
malicious.description: Fires an instant beam that causes a large explosion on impact, similar to a certain familiar face (Maurice). Wipes out groups of weak enemies with ease.

freezeframe.name: Freezeframe Rocket Launcher
freezeframe.description: Press Alt Fire to freeze rockets. Frozen rockets have a larger blast radius and will stay frozen even when switching weapons.

srs_cannon.name: S.R.S. Cannon Rocket Launcher
srs_cannon.description: Press Alt Fire to launch cannonball. Hold to charge distance. Nobody knows what S.R.S. stands for.

firstarter.name: Firstarter Rocket Launcher
firstarter.description: Hold Alt Fire to spray gasoline, making non-flammable enemiesw flammable. Can also be sprayed on the environment to create walls of fire.

feedbacker.name: Feedbacker Arm
feedbacker.description: Fast punch with decent damage. Can parry most attacks, includiong shotgun shots and coins.

knuckleblaster.name: Knuckleblaster Arm
knuckleblaster.description: Slow punch with high damage and knockback. Hold punch to blast shells inside the knickles, causing a shockwave that knocks surrounding enemies away

whiplash.name: Whiplash Arm
whiplash.description: A winch with a spear. Hold to throw, release to pull. Can pull light enemies and items, will get pulled to heavy enemies and Hookpoints.
